metadata.title: CVE-2023-49938 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SchedMD Slurm 22.05.x and 23.02.x. There isIncorrect Access Control: an attacker can modified their extended grouplist that is used with the sbcast subsystem, and open files with anunauthorized set of extended groups. The fixed versions are 22.05.11 and23.02.7.

criterions.comment: slurm-llnl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
